titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to modify the authority for haying and grazing on wheat and feed grain reduced acreage, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5218)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to modify the authority for haying and grazing on wheat and feed grain reduced acreage, including a provision under which producers can elect to lease such acreage back for specified fees.
